statement.p: How deeply our feet press into snow or sand depends on the pressure. Pressure is given by
\displaystyle{F} is the force in lbs, and
\displaystyle{A} is the area in square inches
Suppose Courtney weighs \displaystyle{23} lbs and each foot has area \displaystyle{32} square inches. While standing still what pressure does Courtney exert on the ground? psi
